message.body: Where does your friend on Atlantic ave live?
I think it's the corner of 3rd and Atlantic. It's in Brooklyn heights:)
That's 2 miles away from darshan's apartment
He's a block from nostrand ave
ï¿¼
Um... That's kind of out there. Is he near a train station?
No. I think he likes it for now
Dude! That is not the area I was describing at all. Is he going to move???
He says it's only a 20minute commute
Dear lord. Tell him to be careful.
He says it's not that bad over there anymore
I told him I'd let you track his phone gps if it would make you feel better
Lol if he ever needs to escape he can come here. Please tell me he has people here though. He's not living alone is he?
He has a roommate. But the roommate is traveling so he is pretty much by himself in the apartment
And his friend Kartik is there at the same school and he has some family
Morgan. Seriously if he ever feels unsafe please direct him to me. Bed stuy is such a sketchy neighborhood
I think he'll be ok
I'm sure he will. But just in case. I don't know if they've calmed down in Brooklyn, but the violent protests in Manhattan are at an all time high.
No he said it's pretty quiet
Beautiful.
He says he smells the occasional wafting scent of canibus but that's it
That makes me feel so much better.
Where there's weed there's low key enthusiasts. Where there's low key enthusiasts there's not much fuss. ... Generally.
